text: Doris was patient in explaining my existing policy and help me with online login. Thank you so much. Better to come down in person instead of call hotline.

Spent a good 40 minutes with Elysia Ng from the Marina One customer service centre
who clearly and patiently explained my various Prudential policies to me including the guaranteed / non guaranteed portions and what is covered / not. Keep up the great service and positive attitude.

Doris is very helpful and an excellent problem solver!

She’s an asset to the organization!

Thank you so much!

Prudential’s customer platform lacks transparency, making it difficult to access clear policy information. Both financial advisers and customer service representatives often appear uninformed, and responses—especially via email—are slow and inaccurate. Additionally, the company has been late with premium deductions and bonus payments, which does not inspire confidence in its reliability. Given these experiences, I would not consider purchasing from them again.

I loved the advise, and guidance provided by the Customer Service. They are always professional and very patience. Joycelyn, the CS officer, is so helpful and caring. I am so proud to be insured with Prudential for more than 45 years. Thank you.
